name: oversupply
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a greater supply of something than is needed: The coffee market is suffering from oversupply. We have an oversupply of unsold cars in the showroom. Synonyms
glut
surfeit formal

ECONOMICS, COMMERCE a larger supply of something than is needed: The coffee market is suffering from oversupply.(an) oversupply of sth We have an oversupply of unsold cars.
ECONOMICS, COMMERCE to provide or have more of something than is wanted or needed: The building of office space has risen 57%, causing concern that the market will be oversupplied.
